intro: Tralalero, a blue shark with legs and sneakers, embarks on an absurd and chaotic adventure to recover his lost voice in a bugged world filled with betrayals and humor.
description:
ERROR 401 

A viral AI has broken him into musical fragments scattered across absurd glitch worlds. To get him back, he'll have to sing, dance, be out of tune, and survive enemies as ridiculous as they are dramatic.

With his inseparable companion Brr Brr Patapim, a head with giant feet, he'll embark on a musical odyssey where the illogical becomes logical... and the off-key, pure melody.

Main features:

·An absurd, chaotic, and humorous musical journey.

·Extravagant characters: from a crocodile plane to a pixel boy.

·Colorful glitch worlds where every step sounds different.

·A story where imperfection is true harmony.

·For all audiences: laughter, rhythm, and madness guaranteed.
